body.name: Flash Furniture Alan Office Task Chair - Brown Vinyl - Black Frame - Armless - Ribbed Back and Seat - Low Back Design
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 45 mins
FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 16 hrs 45 mins
features: Be a trendsetter at the office or at home with the cutting-edge looks of this two-tone office task chair
Trendy Profile: Low back design with ribbed vinyl upholstery and black metal border; Non-restrictive armless design for better room flow and user movement
Supportive Mobility: Full swivel seat with pneumatic seat height adjustment and 5-star black base with dual-wheel casters to reach multiple work surfaces; Low back design supports the lower back
Low Maintenance: Cleans easily with water followed by a damp cloth
PRODUCT MEASUREMENTS: Overall Size: 18"W x 21.5"D x 31.25-36"H; Seat Size: 17.5"W x 16"D x 18-23"H; Back Size: 17.5"W x 14.5"H
body.description: Modern accents and a sleek profile make this ribbed office task chair a perfect addition to your board room, business, or home office. A streamlined silhouette combined with the armless design can breathe new life into a small workspace and not only allows room for more board members, clients or visitors but also permits you to roll further under a desk or table to get closer to your monitor or paperwork preventing back strain. The glossy brown vinyl upholstery with a black metal border paired with a contrasting black frame and base gives an up-market feel to any professional space. When you spend the majority of your day at your computer, comfort is key. The low back design and foam molded seat and back provide lower back support for those who do a lot of typing. A pneumatic seat height adjustment lever lets you easily position the chair where you need it while the 360° swivel gives you access to all of your work surfaces with minimal effort. This sturdy task chair has a heavy duty, 5-star black base with dual-wheel casters for effortless mobility. Spills clean up easily with water followed by a dry cloth. Whether you work from home or go into the office, this designer armless task chair is a great choice for any workspace.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Curved Back The curved back design perfectly hugs and supports the spine for improved posture and hours of comfort. Height Adjustment The pneumatic adjustment lever will allow you to easily adjust the seat to your desired height to maximize your work space efficiency. Base Our heavy-duty 5-star chrome base adds a stylish look to compliment a contemporary office space. Dual caster wheels are designed to add stability and ease of movement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid, stylish, narrow desk chair
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this chair for about a month. Overall really pleased with it. Narrow enough to (mostly) fit under a keyhole desk. Comfortable for working from home and rolls well on thin carpet. Easy to assemble. Feels stable.Several reviews I had read said it wasn't padded enough to be comfortable, but I haven't noticed it being any less comfortable than most office-type chairs - sitting for hours and hours isn't comfortable in any chair!Okay for price - I was able to get mine "used - like new" and from what I could tell it was brand new, just not in original packaging. Definitely worth it for the used price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek, modern and comfortable!
reviews.reviewText: I was worried that this chair, as thin as it was, would be uncomfortable. But it provides cushion and support at all the necessary places, especially the lower back, without looking like a couch. I got the chair in white, and it really is a lovely piece of furniture for only $80. The height is easily adjustable while sitting on it, using the lever under the seat. The chair took just a few minutes to assemble; there were only 4 screws to screw in, using the allen wrench that came with it. The vinyl is super soft, which makes me wonder how durable it will be, but for $80, if it gets a rip, I'll just buy a new chair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Chairs at a Great Price
reviews.reviewText: These are much better looking in person and the padding is a little bit thicker than it looks in the picture. Look far more expensive than they are. I first ordered two of them and my (handicapped) husband put them together in a matter of minutes. He really loved them with our new retro dining table. Love that they roll instead of scraping the floor. They glide easily and we're pretty hefty people. I was so pleased with my first purchase that I went back and ordered another two to make it a full set of these. Beautiful chairs, comfortable, glide easily... love that you can set your own height so that YOU are comfortable at any height table... I like my chair a little higher than my husband and these can accommodate your body type easily. Love these chairs. Update: It's been over a month now and I still hold these chairs in high regard. My contractors seem to walk in and sit in them every day and these have held up without a scratch. Also had a newly installed laminate floor and even with these brutes sitting on them, the floors have not been scratched, the chairs still look like new. Still consider them a great deal after more than a month of hard use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent chair, but better options out there for back health
reviews.reviewText: The chair was super easy to put together. It also looks nice in here and easy to adjust. That said, it's not the most ergonomic/supportive chair - if back health is your priority there are better options out there. Fairly priced and you get what you pay for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and sleek
reviews.reviewText: It took me 10 minutes to assemble this chair and that's only because I do not read instructions. This chair looked small but when I sat down, it was the perfect height, very comfortable and aestheticly pleasing. Love it, and it is quite economical.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice desk chair
reviews.reviewText: Really nice chair for a slimmer person. Just what I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is not for all day sitting chair, need it slim line by customer desk- so its not bulky for showroom

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Love Low Profile But Chair Doesn’t Stay Up
reviews.reviewText: I love the clean, non bulky profile of this chair, but I’m bummed the chair doesn’t hold its height. I need to keep adjusting it. It’s comfortable for short periods of time. I’m not sure it would be for 6 hours or more.
La verdad el diseño me encantó, es muy cómoda y se puede limpiar facilmente.Su único detalle podría ser que no se puede reclinar, pero la verdad no lo necesita ya que es super cómoda.
Very comfortable and worth the money

I needed a smaller rolling chair to use in my sewing room. This chair is comfortable and rolls easily. I was very happy to see that it goes higher than most office chairs as one of my sewing machines is on a higher desk and I haven't been able to find a suitable chair. My sister tried it out and ordered one for her husband for Christmas because she was so impressed.
Es cómoda y se desplaza perfectamente.

Ho acquistato questa sedia principalmente per il design. Molto bella, non ingombrante, perfetta per l'arredamento del mio studio. Inoltre il prezzo era allettante e credo che la qualità sia adatta ad un prodotto comunque di fascia media. Se avete maggiori esigenze di comfort "sprecare" 80 euro circa per questa sedia non vi conviene, a un prezzo raddoppiato trovate sedie ergonomiche sicuramente più adatte a chi trascorre tanto tempo davanti a un PC.Per chi come me invece cerca una semplice sedia comoda per stare qualche ora davanti a una scrivania, è perfetta!Comunque spedizione perfetta, facile da montare, nessun problema insomma. Arrivata intatta e con tutti i pezzi necessari per assemblarla. Comoda la leva per alzarla o abbassarla, resistente lo schienale, buono il materiale. Ad un prezzo superiore ai 100 non la comprerei, ma per il prezzo pagato va più che bene!Vi lascio qualche foto di come è adesso, trascorsi tre mesi di utilizzo.Se vi va lasciate un 👍, spero di esservi stata d'aiuto !
